You have a Samsung Galaxy Tab A 10.5 that no longer holds a charge the way it did when it was new?

Your Samsung Galaxy Tab A 10.5 shuts down unexpectedly?

Does your cell phone only work when the battery is plugged in?

Those are common symptoms that a defective battery will have.

It is time to get a new Samsung Galaxy Tab A 10.5 replacement battery.

The old battery in your cell phone can outgrow inside and damage the internals.

The OEM Batteries for Samsung Galaxy Tab A 10.5 T590 are brand-new batteries coming directly from our manufacturer. They are custom-built for customers who demand the same quality as original Samsung batteries. 

  • Zero cycle count
  • Tested under extreme weather
  • No wrapping for a better fit
  • High output current capacity
  • 1 Year Warranty

Compatibility

This battery is only compatible with a Samsung Galaxy Tab A 10.5.
